abstract: The underwriters of Bradford & Bingley‘s rights issue have agreed to buy the 72 percent of shares that remained after only 28 percent of the British bank’s rights issue was subscribed.
lead_paragraph: The underwriters of Bradford & Bingley‘s rights issue have agreed to buy the 72 percent of shares that remained after only 28 percent of the British bank’s rights issue was subscribed.

headline.main: Citigroup and UBS on the Hook for Bradford & Bingley Rights Issue
